mapper.select: select id, name, dep, position from member m, memberPosition mp where m.pno=mp.pno and m.pno!=9 order by id desc
select id, name, dep, position from member m, memberPosition mp where m.pno=mp.pno and m.pno!=9 and name=#{search} (name=#{search} or dep=#{search}) order by id desc
select id, name, dep, position, m.pno, manager, tel, phone from member m, memberPosition mp where m.pno=mp.pno and id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, dep, pno, manager, tel, phone) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{dep}, #{pno}, #{manager}, #{tel}, #{phone})
mapper.update: update member set tel=#{tel}, phone=#{phone}, pw=#{newPw} where id=#{id}
update member set pw=#{pw} where id=#{id}
